Visualize Incoming Calls (Reverse Dependency)

visualize_callers.Rd

Generates a graph showing every function that calls the target function. Can render immediately in RStudio or export a raw .dot file.

Usage

visualize_callers(target_func, dir_path = ".", save_dot = NULL)

Arguments

target_func

String. Name of the function to trace.

dir_path

String. Project root.

save_dot

String. Optional path to save the raw DOT file (e.g. "graph.dot").

Value

A DiagrammeR graph object (invisibly if save_dot is used).

Author

Mark London

On this page

Developed by Mark London.
